citeulike_paper.title: The demographics of web search
citeulike_paper.abstract: ￃﾢ users ￃﾢ queries ￃﾢ search engines Web ￃﾢ today, there are more than 130 million Web servers ￃﾢ Web is the largest data repository (estimated as 100 billion pages) ￃﾢ well-connected graph with out- and in-link power law distributions Users ￃﾢ culturally and educationally diverse ￃﾢ little patience (few queries posed & few answers seen)

source.title: In In Proceedings of the 33th annual international ACM SIGIR conference on Research and development in information retrieval (2010)ￂﾠ Key: citeulike:11506051
